Package com.mygdx.othello.views

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Screen
    This interface defines the overall structure of a View (Screen) class
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractScreen
    This class is a template for all the Screens in the application
    DialogScreen
    A Dialog Window that pops out of the Screen when the game ends
    GameScreen
    This class manages the game display, i.e. the board, the pawns, the score, etc..
    MenuScreen
    This class manages the menu display, knowing the buttons to switch to the other screens
    RulesScreen
    This class manage the Rules screen
    SettingsScreen
    This class manages the settings display, i.e the buttons, the slider and the scroll pane
